instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00928 fan spin, no chime, no touch bar
threads.message:
No chime, nothing on touch bar, trackpad clicks, CPU warm, fans spins, no image on ext display.
Takes 20V and 4.20A from 87W 100% genuine charger.

Board very clean - no liquid.

Got small experience with that design - :( any idea guys?

I got Apple data Migration Tool 076-00236 but never used - maybe you guys got some guide how to use it?

threads.title: 820-00928 fan spin, no chime, no touch bar
threads.message:
Can you confirm USB activity at least?
Did you try PRAM reset?

threads.title: 820-00928 fan spin, no chime, no touch bar
threads.message: Sounds like trash....data tool is easy plug into lifeboat connector then plug into a known good Mac. The tool basically makes the dead board an external HDD
